page.title: 11Children at the Eisteddfod
page.content: Local children were fully involved in the{National Eisteddfod,}an event held alternately in{North}and{South {Wales}in{August,}because this year it was only a few miles away near{Rhyl. Children from our block attending {Heulfre, Twm o'r Nant and Llanrhaedr schools met regularly to practise folk dancing.Large rehearsals took place in Rhyl with dancers from other local areas. The dances were performed on Rhyl{promenade}to welcome visitors and give them an early taste of{eisteddfod activities. Dressed up in traditional Welsh costumes and parading under sch- -ool banners we presented a colourful spectacle.We took part in a children's musical{'Heidi-ho'}which in its finale had over{300}on stage. Some local children were a great hit at the opening ceremony with their sparkling display in a light hearted review.
